front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology-ACSE and Presentation Layer Services-Application Program Interface (API)(C Language Binding)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A C language binding to IEEE Std 1351-1994, a language-independent standard defining an application program interface (API) to the ACSE application service element from the OSI application layer and the connection-oriented services of the presentation layer is defined. The purpose of this API is to support portable implementations of application-specific OSI service elements and non-OSI applications<>
